caption.p: Concentration-dependent Plasmodium falciparum growth inhibition by various extracts. The top panel (a) shows the growth inhibitory characteristics of Alstonia boonei, Senna siamea Lam, and Acanthospermum hispadum of chloroquine-sensitive (3D7) strain of Plasmodium falciparum. The lower panel (b) represents the growth inhibitory activity of the various extracts on chloroquine-resistant (Dd2) strains of P. falciparum.
